name: Los Tress
description:
Los Tress is a famous TV show. Three Hermanos are challenging each other in order to be the last to eat a quite spicy chili peppers. Chill with marakas when a Pinata comes out.

Controls:

  • Left: A, H, left Arrow
  • Right: D, K, right Arrow
  • BlowUp(/Shake Marakas): W, U, up Arrow
  • Such: S, J, down Arrow
  • Click to navigate menues

This game was created in 48 hours in Milan for the Global Game Jam 2018, whose theme was Transmission. It deals with the subject of lagging controls as experienced by Dragon Wizards.

Team:

  • Game design: Marco Cusenza, Piero Pastore
  • Coding: Alberto Paparella, Tommaso Amadori
  • Art: Valeria Orlando
  • Sound: Vincenzo Caravello e Francesco Corsello
